password.rules: Must contain at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 digit and 1 special character.

signInForm.error: Unable to sign in. Please contact the administrator or try again later.

lostPasswordForm.submit: Submit and get a temporary link to choose your new password.
lostPasswordForm.feedback: Your request has been processed. If your email was found, you will receive an email with a link to reset your password. If not, please check your spam folder.

predefinedColorPicker.label: Color
predefinedColorPicker.help: This color is used as background in the workspace listing page.

workspaceForm.title: Create a new workspace
workspaceForm.name: Name
workspaceForm.explainsSlugUse: This workspace will be saved as:
workspaceForm.colorHelp: This color is used in workspace listing page.
workspaceForm.iconHelp: Fill with icon id, list is available on BootstrapIcons.
workspaceForm.publicHelp: Before activating it, please check that the public policy is as expected and that a dedicated page has been made.

updateEmailForm.successMsg: An email has been sent to your current email address to confirm the change.

action.isGreaterThanOrEqualTo: is greater than or equal to
action.isLowerThanOrEqualTo: is lower than or equal to
action.isEarlierThanOrEqualTo: is earlier than or equal to
action.isLaterThanOrEqualTo: is later than or equal to
action.isLoggedInUserGroup: is the group of the logged-in user

createField.title: Create field
createField.name: Name
createField.explainsSlugUse: This field will be saved as:

indexPage.presentation: LocoKit is an open source LCAP (Low Code Application Platform) that provides Database Management as a Spreadsheet with an App Builder.
indexPage.createDatabase: Create your database, according to your business. Share your data, according to the permissions you set!
indexPage.afterBuilding: After building your database, build the app your users will use. They will see your data through UI screens you will make, accordingly the permissions you previously configured.

lostPassword.title: Lost password
lostPassword.description: Do you lose your password? Enter your email to receive a mail with a temporary link. Open it, and update your password!
lostPassword.sendMailToResetPassword: Check in your email and click on the link to create a new password.

resetPassword.title: Password reset
resetPassword.updatedPassword: Your password has been reset. You can now login to the app with this new password.
resetPassword.missingToken: Unable to find your account. It seems that you did not use the link in the email sent by the app.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.description: Complete this form to initiate your registration.
signUp.sendMailToCompleteAccount: Your signup has been processed. You will receive an email with instructions to complete it.

verifySignup.title: Email verification and set password
verifySignup.description: Please set your password before we authorize you to connect.
verifySignup.accountComplete: Your account is complete. You can now login to the app.
verifySignup.missingToken: Unable to find your account. It seems that you did not use the link in the email sent by the app.

workspacesList.title: Workspaces
workspacesList.intro: You must create or select your workspace before adding data or templates.

alreadyAuthenticated.title: Already logged in
alreadyAuthenticated.message: You are already authenticated in this application. You can come back to your workspace or log out.

manual.intro: From this page it is possible to:
manual.create: Create a new user by clicking on the button.
manual.search: Find an existing user using the search bar and filters.
manual.displayAndEdit: View and edit a user's record by clicking on their name.

recordUser.title: User record
recordUser.creator: @:locokit.commons.userProfile.creator
recordUser.messageResendVerifySignup: Are you sure you want to resend a mail to sign up for this user: {username}?
recordUser.messageBlockingUser: Are you sure you want to block this user's account: {username}?
recordUser.messageUnblockingUser: Are you sure you want to unblock this user's account: {username}?
recordUser.explanationAddingGroups: To assign one or more groups to this user, select the groups in the left column and click on the button with the right arrow.
recordUser.explanationRemovingGroups: It also possible to remove one or more groups for this user by selecting groups in the right column.

confirmUpdateEmail.title: Updating your email
confirmUpdateEmail.message: This operation has been successfully completed. You can now log in with your new email.
confirmUpdateEmail.errorMessage: Unfortunately, the operation could not be completed. If the problem persists, please contact the site administrator.

manual.intro: From this page it is possible to:
manual.create: Create a new group by clicking on the button.
manual.search: Find an existing group using the search bar and filters.
manual.displayAndEdit: View and edit a group's record by clicking on their name.

recordGroup.title: Group record
recordGroup.name: Name
recordGroup.explanationAddingUsers: To assign one or more users to this group, select the users in the left column and click on the button with the right arrow.
recordGroup.explanationRemovingUsers: It also possible to remove one or more users for this group by selecting users in the right column.

aboutDatasource.title: @:locokit.pages.workspace.datasource
aboutDatasource.explainDatasource: First thing to do, it is create or import a database to stock your data through the ” @:locokit.pages.datasource.addDatasource ” button.
aboutDatasource.explainTable: Then, it is possible to display database diagram or to display details of a table.

createDatasource.title: Create datasource
createDatasource.name: Name
createDatasource.explainsSlugUse: This datasource will be saved as:
createDatasource.noWorkspace: Unable to access workspace. Please select (again) the desired workspace.

schemaDatasource.title: Datasource schema
schemaDatasource.subTitle: Update: {tableName}
schemaDatasource.explainSchema: Click on a table in the schema to interact with it.
schemaDatasource.noTables: This datasource does not currently contain any tables. To view the schema, you need to create at least one table.

createTable.title: Create table
createTable.name: Name
createTable.explainsSlugUse: This datasource will be saved as:

success.basic: The form have been sent correctly.

error.title: Error
error.basic: Something goes wrong. Please try again later.
error.redundantError: If this issue keeps happening, contact the app administrator.

notAuthenticated.description:
Unable to log in with this information.
Can you please check your input?

noResult.workspace: Unable to find the requested workspace.

messages.email: The field '{field}' does not match the expected format (email).
messages.regex: The field '{field}' does not match the expected format.
messages.confirmed: The value in '{field}' doesn't correspond to the upper field.
messages.isFalseOrOtherTrue: The field '{field}' field can only be checked if the '{target}' field is also checked.
messages.dateValid: The field '{field}' does not match the expected format.
messages.reference: The field '{field}' value is invalid: please select an item from the list.

id_number.name: Id with number
id_number.description: Number of reference of this field (Primary key)

id_uuid.name: Id with UUID
id_uuid.description: UUID of reference of this field (Primary key)

boolean.name: Boolean
boolean.description: Checkbox field useful for true/false values

number.name: Integer
number.description: Designed to hold integer numerical values

float.name: Float
float.description: Designed to hold float numerical values

text.name: Long text
text.description: For text with several sentences or paragraph

date.name: Date
date.description: Display a calendar to select or update a specific date

datetime.name: Date and time
datetime.description: Display a calendar to select or update a specific date and time

user.name: User
user.description: To select user from a predetermined list

group.name: Group
group.description: To select group from a predetermined list

multi_user.name: Multi-user
multi_user.description: To select one or several users from a predetermined list

multi_group.name: Multi group
multi_group.description: To select one or several groups from a predetermined list

relation.name: Link to another table
relation.description: To create a link between two tables by connecting two specific fields

lookup.name: Lookup
lookup.description: To refers to another field on a relation table

virtual_lookup.name: Virtual lookup
virtual_lookup.description: To refers to another field on a relation table, does not duplicate the data

rollup.name: Rollup
rollup.description: To aggregate some fields on a relation table

single_select.name: Single select
single_select.description: To select an value from a predetermined list

multi_select.name: Multi-select
multi_select.description: To select one or several values from a predetermined list

formula.name: Formula
formula.description: To compute a value with some functions

url.name: URL
url.description: To match an URL (begin by https://…)

geometry.name: Geometry without control
geometry.description: To store WKT geometry without control on its shape

geometry_point.name: Point geometry
geometry_point.description: To match a WKT point geometry

geometry_polygon.name: Polygon geometry
geometry_polygon.description: To match a WKT polygon geometry

geometry_linestring.name: Linestring geometry
geometry_linestring.description: To match a WKT linestring geometry

geometry_multipoint.name: Multi-point geometry
geometry_multipoint.description: To match a WKT multi-point geometry

geometry_multipolygon.name: Multi-polygon geometry
geometry_multipolygon.description: To match a WKT multi-polygon geometry

geometry_multilinestring.name: Multi-linestring geometry
geometry_multilinestring.description: To match a WKT multi-linestring geometry
